sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable import/no-anonymous-default-export */ import React, { useState } from 'react' import EditButton from './EditButton' import Delete from './Delete' export default function Task({task}) { const [editOn, setEditOn] = useState(false) const onSubmitHandler =(event)=>{ event.preventDefault() const form = new FormData(event.target) if (form.get('action') === 'cancel'){ console.log('delete') setEditOn(prev => !prev) } else if (form.get('action') === 'edit'){ console.log('edit') } } return (
{!editOn ? <>

{task.task}

{task.taskDescription}

:
}
) }
